tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_session_data (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id UUID,
  game_name VARCHAR,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  duration INTERVAL,
  score INTEGER,
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE game_sessions (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id UUID,
  game_id UUID,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id UUID,
  player_id UUID,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT,
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    player_email VARCHAR(100),
    join_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE games (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_name VARCHAR(50),
    game_category VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE game_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    session_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE game_feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id UUID REFERENCES game_sessions(session_id),
    player_id UUID REFERENCES players(player_id),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);
